ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (AND(NOT(ISBLANK(SCC_Account_Number__c)),NOT(AND( LEN(SCC_Account_Number__c) >= 15, LEN(SCC_Account_Number__c) <= 18, REGEX(SCC_Account_Number__c, "^[0-9]{15,18}$"))))) && ( SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '8812' || SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '8915' || Sent_to_Drone__c = TRUE ) && NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration)
